text:
Very bad quality of product and services .found a lock screw get rusty and broken within 2 months . Then, I get a new replacement for it after waited for more than 6 months . Next then surprisingly , a same problem again happened to the new replacement set with a rusty lock screw within 2 months in used. Now , the staff said there will be have no more warranty.

Just imagined , that you spent more than a thousand dollar for a rusty set of spectacles set and the staff told you that it is normal to happened .

moreover,  the staff  is so rude, annoying and disrespectful. They even can claimed that it is not their responsibility to sold you a bad quality of product and proudly told you that a similar  problem is just happened to many other customers .

I got wearing glasses for more than 30yrs and this is the worse ones in my entire life . Paid for a thousand dollar and it only can be use for 2 months !!

Really good service, I was there  to check my eye and he said if you check only services fees 25$ , if you make glass there are no service charges after they check my eye I have no problem with my eye ,and then everything was free . Good serviceðŸ‘
Friendly staff with good experience. Patient to explain and guide you along. Been patronising it >15 years ago.
Excellent service by uncle who checked my wife's eyes n gave very detailed explanation.. Highly recommended..
